actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a loan program to provide educational assistance to Vietnam-era veterans and their eligible dependents who were unable to complete a program of education before the expiration of their eligibility for benefits under the GI bill.

summary.text: Establishes a loan program to provide educational assistance to Vietnam-era veterans and their eligible dependents who either did not commence or were unable to complete a program of education before the expiration of the delimiting period.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a loan program to provide educational assistance to Vietnam-era veterans and their eligible dependents who were unable to complete a program of education before the expiration of their eligibility for benefits under the GI bill.
